docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 15 Health officials of all American republics except Cuba opened a five-day conference today to draft plans for the massive assault on disease called for in the Charter of the Alliance for Progress.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 15 Health officials of all American republics except Cuba opened a five-day conference today to draft plans for the massive assault on disease called for in the Charter of the Alliance for Progress.
docs.abstract: Conf of all Amer repubs except Cuba opens, Washington, to plan massive assault on disease called.for in Alliance for Progress Charter; Pres Kennedy message; Sec Alvarez Amezquita elected conf pres

headline.main: AMERICAS PARLEY ON HEALTH OPENS; Aim Is to Achieve Goals of Alliance for Progress

docs.snippet: MIAMI, April 18 (AP) Following is the text of the translation of a statement in Spanish made public today by Dr. Jose Miro Cardona, who resigned as president of the Cuban Revolutionary Council:
docs.lead_paragraph: MIAMI, April 18 (AP) Following is the text of the translation of a statement in Spanish made public today by Dr. Jose Miro Cardona, who resigned as president of the Cuban Revolutionary Council:

headline.main: Statement by Dr. Miro Cardona on His Resignation From Cuban Exile Council; Resignation Past Events 2 Important Days: April 20 and May 4, 1961 The Council's Activities The Honorable Dean Rusk Richard N. Return of the Fighters. docs.snippet: SAO PAULO, Brazil, April 18 (UPI) Canadian and Puerto Rican athletes were stricken with food poisoning from eating cream puffs en route to the Pan-American Games today, but the second contingent of United States competitors arrived without incident.
docs.lead_paragraph: SAO PAULO, Brazil, April 18 (UPI) Canadian and Puerto Rican athletes were stricken with food poisoning from eating cream puffs en route to the Pan-American Games today, but the second contingent of United States competitors arrived without incident.
docs.abstract: Canadian and PR athletes stricken en route to Pan-Amer Games; cream puffs blamed

headline.main: MANY TAKEN ILL ON WAY TO GAMES; Pan-American Competitors Suffer Food Poisoning
